About Me

Let me tell you a few things

BIO

Hi, my name is Philipp Mossier, Web Developer from Austria. I'm frontend focused with fullstack experience. As a tenacious self-taught programmer, i have contributed to open source, created some small to mediocre apps and improving my skills continiously.

Currently i am working daily on an massive E-commerce Project which i am very passionate about. Its an fashion online store called "wibble" (MyGithub for more info). The project is build with React, Sass, Firebase, Google Authentication and Redux. My next step is adding Redux Saga and GraphQL in my codebase. I love the potential about React and his reusable components, so i focused on that on all my lines of code.
